General.Name: INC S.A.
General.Description: INC S.A. provides investment and advisory services to small and medium-sized enterprises, and local government units in Poland. The company was formerly known as INVESTcon GROUP Spólka Akcyjna and changed its name to INC S.A. in February 2014. INC S.A. was founded in 1995 and is based in Poznan, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Sebastian  Huczek
1.Title: Vice Chairman of Management Board & Head of Legal Department
